hero.description: Timeless wisdom from the world's greatest minds, uniquely selected for your current state of mind. Transform your mood into actionable inspiration.

motivation.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
motivation.author: Confucius

motivation.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
motivation.author: Steve Jobs

motivation.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
motivation.author: Winston Churchill

motivation.text: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
motivation.author: Zig Ziglar

motivation.text: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
motivation.author: Suzy Kassem

motivation.text: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
motivation.author: C.S. Lewis

motivation.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
motivation.author: Mark Twain

motivation.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
motivation.author: Walt Disney

inspiration.text: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
inspiration.author: Alan Kay

inspiration.text: Everything you can imagine is real.
inspiration.author: Pablo Picasso

inspiration.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
inspiration.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

inspiration.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
inspiration.author: John Lennon

inspiration.text: I have no special talent. I am only passionately curious.
inspiration.author: Albert Einstein

inspiration.text: Nature never hurries, yet everything is accomplished.
inspiration.author: Lao Tzu

inspiration.text: Keep your face always toward the sunshine, and shadows will fall behind you.
inspiration.author: Walt Whitman

inspiration.text: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
inspiration.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

calm.text: Empty your mind, be formless, shapeless — like water.
calm.author: Bruce Lee

calm.text: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
calm.author: Buddha

calm.text: The soul always knows what to do to heal itself. The challenge is to silence the mind.
calm.author: Caroline Myss

calm.text: He who is of a calm and happy nature will hardly feel the pressure of age.
calm.author: Plato

calm.text: The more tranquil a man becomes, the greater is his success, his influence, his power for good.
calm.author: James Allen

calm.text: Tension is who you think you should be. Relaxation is who you are.
calm.author: Chinese Proverb

calm.text: Within you, there is a stillness and a sanctuary to which you can retreat at any time and be yourself.
calm.author: Hermann Hesse

confidence.text: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.
confidence.author: Henry Ford

confidence.text: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
confidence.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

confidence.text: With confidence, you have won before you have started.
confidence.author: Marcus Garvey

confidence.text: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities!
confidence.author: Norman Vincent Peale

confidence.text: One important key to success is self-confidence. A key to self-confidence is preparation.
confidence.author: Arthur Ashe

confidence.text: Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love.
confidence.author: Lao Tzu

confidence.text: As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live.
confidence.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

confidence.text: The most beautiful thing you can wear is confidence.
confidence.author: Blake Lively

love.text: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
love.author: William Shakespeare

love.text: The greatest thing you'll ever learn is just to love and be loved in return.
love.author: Eden Ahbez

love.text: Where there is love there is life.
love.author: Mahatma Gandhi

love.text: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
love.author: Lao Tzu

love.text: Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope.
love.author: Maya Angelou

love.text: The best and most beautiful things in this world cannot be seen or even heard, but must be felt with the heart.
love.author: Helen Keller

love.text: If I know what love is, it is because of you.
love.author: Hermann Hesse

love.text: Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that.
love.author: Martin Luther King Jr.
